attributes.action: End lockdown for everyone under 75 years old
attributes.additional_details: COVID-19 restrictions are disproportionally damaging to the young and their life chances.  Particularly those from disadvantages background.  Moreover the damage being done to the economy is unsustainable and will result in a much poorer country for years to come.
attributes.background: Schools and all places of learning to reopen, places of employment to reopen, all shops and services to reopen.  Everyone over 75 years old and all those deemed clinically vulnerable should remain ‘at home’

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Fund & provide services to allow the vulnerable to shield & re-open the economy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
